name: Lunar Escape (Mateuu)
description:
You land on the moon when disaster strikes - an asteroid destroys your moon lander!!! It's your job to solve puzzles to find all four missing pieces. Once you collect them, you can fly back to Earth.

The game uses a unique puzzle mechanic - you ricochet rocks . You need to ricochet the rocks in the correct order in order to build a bridge for the astronaut to cross.

There are 45 unique levels!

Music by Yoinkus

Play testing by TheCommoner

SFX:

  • dustyroom.com
  • Epic Game Hits SFX
  • Grenade Sounds FX

All sounds downloaded from Unity Asset Store

Thanks to everybody who helped me with this game! I really appreciate it. Also, thank you for downloading it!
